bwwExcerpt: Many iconic moments from the movie are welcomed surprises, not shoehorned fan service. The striped sandworm, “Jump in the Line,” and a Scooby-Doo-style chase featuring Miss Argentina, Shrunken Head Man and other Netherworld characters all make appearances, and the designs, which riff on the outlandish, signature Burton aesthetic, are eye-popping. Even the uncomfortable child bride plot is transformed into a green card situation for Beetlejuice, which is underlined by the cringey, yet catchy tune
